alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 10:44PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jackson, south central Kiowa and northwestern Tillman Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1044 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Manitou, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Snyder, Roosevelt, Headrick, Friendship, Tom Steed Reservoir, and Altus Air Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
